title: Corporate Training Policy Analysis Project for Innovating Lifelong Learning Accessibility

context.prior_knowledge: Basic organizational management skills and understanding of lifelong learning policies
context.additional_context: Conducted in a smartphone-based limited-technology environment, involving collaborative projects analyzing real corporate cases

learning_goals: Learners can analyze the impact of corporate training policies on employees' learning motivation
Learners can propose policy alternatives to improve lifelong learning accessibility as project deliverables.
Learners can perform effective communication in large-scale learning environments using team-based collaboration tools.

resources: Government policy documents on lifelong learning
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
